description: Simple crowd pleaser for the whole family. Mango is in season now so I am combining my two favourite into one dessert.
keywords: Jelly,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango Coconut Jelly Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small pot, combine water, sugar, milk and coconut cream. Stir for one minute. Then gradually add gelatine powder. Stir continuously to dissolve the powder. Remove the mixture from heat once it starts to boil. Set it aside and let it cool down.
Once the coconut cream mixture cooled down, pour a layer into a rectangular container. Add in the diced mangoes from step 2 and put it in freezer for 10 minutes.
After 10 minutes, take it out from freezer and repeat step 3 until the container is filled. Then refrigerate for a few hours.
When it is cold, cut it into cubes with sharp knife and enjoy.
